subject: Design
title: Dark Mode: Designing for the Night
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Dark Mode: Designing for the Night.

hook.text: Early computers had light text on dark screens. Then everything went white. Now dark mode is back.

buildup.text: As screen time exploded, users complained about eye strain from blinding white interfaces.

discovery.text: Dark mode reduces blue light exposure and can save up to 60% battery on OLED screens.

twist.text: Apple and Google raced to ship dark mode in 2019. It became the most requested OS feature ever.

climax.text: A cosmetic preference became a health and accessibility feature adopted by billions.

punchline.text: User preferences aren't just preferences. They're design requirements.

quiz.question: What practical benefit does dark mode offer on OLED screens?
